name: Mohamed Adam Jemal
title: Junior IoT and FULL STACK DEVELOPER
description: Computer Science graduate passionate about problem-solving and developing innovative digital solutions. Specialized in MERN stack technologies and modern web development with a focus on real-time applications and user experience.

about.intro: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a Computer Science degree, specializing in creating innovative digital solutions. I have solid expertise in MERN stack technologies (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and Next.js, enabling me to develop modern and high-performance web applications.
about.secondary: Currently deepening my knowledge in DevOps and Artificial Intelligence as part of continuous improvement and adaptation to new technologies. I'm seeking opportunities to apply my knowledge in a stimulating professional environment and actively contribute to the success of ambitious projects.

values.title: Problem Solving

values.title: Modern Technologies
values.description: Expertise in MERN stack, Next.js, and real-time technologies for interactive applications.

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: Currently expanding knowledge in DevOps and AI to stay current with emerging technologies.

contact.description: Ready to bring your next project to life? Let's create something extraordinary together.
